title: Geraint Thomas on Giro d’Italia: ‘Tadej Is One of the Greatest Ever, but We Are Relishing the Challenge’
content:
2023 runner-up says Ineos Grenadiers is confident while also recognizing beating Pogačar will be a ‘massive task’.
